Cards - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Cards() - Constructor for class Cards
 
checkBJorBust() - Method in class GameLogic
This checks the user's hand to see if he has won or lost.
checkDouble() - Method in class Hands
Checks if the card already has been played, if so, requests another card to be randomised until one that hasn't been used is randomised.
checkPush() - Method in class GameLogic
Check if the dealer has a score of 21, if the dealer does then it is a draw (push).
checkWin() - Method in class GameLogic
Checks if the dealer has won or lost.
